SummaryEnglish: Pokémon Generations revisits each generation of the Pokémon video game series to shed new light on some timeless moments. From the earliest days in the Kanto region to the splendor of the Kalos region, go behind the scenes and witness Pokémon history with new eyes!

1.SummaryEnglish: From Viridian Forest to Terminus Cave, see the Pokémon world as never before!

2.SummaryEnglish: Detective Looker of the International Police uncovers critical information in the hunt for Team Rocket Boss Giovanni!

3.SummaryEnglish: A new challenger approaches to test his abilities against the Kanto region’s Elite Four. Will he prove himself worthy?

4.SummaryEnglish: With rumors of a Red Gyarados rampaging in the Lake of Rage, Lance of the Elite Four decides to investigate.

5.SummaryEnglish: In the wake of Team Rocket’s takeover of the Goldenrod Radio Tower, Detective Looker’s investigation leads him to an enigmatic young Trainer.

6.SummaryEnglish: The mysterious traveler Eusine explores the legends of Ecruteak City’s Burned Tower and the Pokémon who rose from its ashes.

7.SummaryEnglish: When an uninvited guest breaks into their headquarters, Team Magma must race against time to make their ambitions a reality.

8.SummaryEnglish: Deep under the sea, Team Aqua’s leader is about to achieve his greatest goal. Can one voice of reason turn the tide of destruction?

9.SummaryEnglish: While the Hoenn region rejoices after avoiding meteoric destruction, reporter Gabby and her cameraman Ty uncover the story of a lifetime.

10.SummaryEnglish: Late at night, a young traveler and her Chansey lose their way in Eterna Forest. They soon stumble upon a house—but what waits inside?

11.SummaryEnglish: With the beginnings of a new universe laid out before him, Cyrus of Team Galactic faces extreme opposition. But aid arrives in an unusual form.

12.SummaryEnglish: The remnants of Team Galactic have awakened Heatran deep within Stark Mountain. Who can stop their burning ambitions from erupting into catastrophe?

13.SummaryEnglish: With the ascension of their king and the fall of the Pokémon League, Team Plasma is poised to take control—until the Gym Leaders arrive!

14.SummaryEnglish: Gym Leader Drayden prepares to defend Opelucid City against Team Plasma, but the true nature of their plans will chill him to his very core.

15.SummaryEnglish: His plans left in ruins, Ghetsis makes one last attempt to bring Unova under his icy grasp. A hero arrives, intending to stop him.

16.SummaryEnglish: Scientist. Entrepreneur. Visionary. Take a closer look at the man whose acts have redefined the Kalos region: Lysandre.

17.SummaryEnglish: Detective Looker’s assistants Emma and Mimi have been helping him out in Lumiose City, until a crime wave threatens to tear them apart.

18.SummaryEnglish: A new champion rises. An ancient king returns. A sorrow that has lasted 3,000 years is brought to an end.
